actions.text: On agreeing to the Spence amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of amendments numbered 6, 7 (modified), 11, 13, 14, 15 (modified), 18, 21, 22, 23, 32 (modified), 35, 36, 38, 39, 40, 42 (modified), and 44 printed on pages H5883-H5891 in the Congressional Record for June 13, 1995.
purpose: An amendment, consisting of the text of several amendments made in order by the rule and printed in part II of House Rept. 104-136 as amendment Nos. 6, 7 (modified), 11, 13, 14, 15 (modified), 18, 21, 22, 23, 32 (modified), 35, 36, 38, 39, 40, 42 (modified), and 44.
